body: This feels like tail wagging the dog. Wouldn't you rather have a complete definition for `ValueTracingStateElem` and incomplete types for `TracingState` and `Value`? (does the destructor problem apply to `weak_ptr` too?)
body_html: This feels like tail wagging the dog. Wouldn't you rather have a complete definition for ValueTracingStateElem and incomplete types for TracingState and Value? (does the destructor problem apply to weak_ptr too?)
